title: PMS 2.0 750 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Von Miller, Coach P's Keys With Chuck Pagano LIVE From The ThunderDome, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, Darius Butler, and the boys chat about tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Dolphins and the Bengals, leaked practice footage from the Dolphins walkthrough yesterday that Mike McDaniel was already two steps ahead of, the Brett Favre saga continuing with more damning information coming out, some of the league leaders around the NFL, and everything else we need to know about as prepare for week 4 of the NFL season. Joining the progrum for his weekly spot is 2x Super Bowl Champion, Super Bowl MVP, future Hall of Fame Defensive End for the Buffalo Bills, Von Miller, to chat about last week's tough loss against the Dolphins in Miami and why he takes it as a positive, his thoughts on every field needing to be natural grass, how losing guys like Jordan Poyer and Micah Hyde is tough, his thoughts on Lamar Jackson and the Ravens this week, and much more (1:35:48-2:00:01). Later, former Head Coach of the Indianapolis Colts, Chuck Pagano joins the progrum for his weekly Coach P's Keys segment where he gives the keys to victory for both the Dolphins and Bengals, before making his pick for the game (2:00:03-2:50:39). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
